purpose: To demonstrate and reference multi-agent system projects built with Crew AI, serving as a comprehensive hub for enthusiasts and developers.
principle: Leverages Crew AI for creating and coordinating multi-agent systems, focusing on collaboration and integration of different agent functionalities.
reusability: Includes examples and references that can be adapted or expanded upon by developers interested in multi-agent systems.
limitations: Primarily serves as a showcase and reference; specific implementations may require additional customization for production use.
name: Awesome-AI-Agents-HUB-for-CrewAI
description: In this repository I will showcase my cool multi agent system projects with Crew AI, and will reference other cool projects on the subject : )
highlight: Showcases a variety of multi-agent system projects using Crew AI, providing a hub for learning and reference.
